display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ReMDKmnR8bcQ7kNvwE3RqcZ&_nc_oc=Adlxus8J5WB_jwZsvvd-F9WCErD20R-ZfQ2zlyicJQ4pX9wLzJJvRpu5kILDGTcFBf0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ELm21DwqXkrykMc8Qih6xA&oh=00_AfJ89IZl9HaO0sA9kLJuORqiafH8zxcO0aiLZdfG7GlAOQ&oe=68397FDD)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=jvY_Q5p7BacQ7kNvwEVtX5d&_nc_oc=Adl08Cakhg4rhArL3UP5DzkhyLPv42iKfEMZTG-ztXuYLXbrLDS18CcrDB9vOtofL2M&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ELm21DwqXkrykMc8Qih6xA&oh=00_AfIjdpi4fZgm4AVSvHFgRT8nn8De_JCGJsnViOMWaBKxrw&oe=68396192)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=KvYhtsf_kswQ7kNvwEvRm-T&_nc_oc=AdlfzWdwJRNGYAxvYIOKQ6m3BOJMGW51WmGXGSA_L05WlwEMwZZAfn0KPnckCACFn4Q&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ELm21DwqXkrykMc8Qih6xA&oh=00_AfIUxzE7VPm7PZDHVsuvCnYFvBrpIevcQL95-5AxgpHDpQ&oe=683967A3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-iYt8Tz86RUQ7kNvwHH_Ca6&_nc_oc=Adn0ztBqKB_Dyc9dRR77O3FGgWvU_aD9PfUz0IcVqTNt_pdPeTU1SC8QunoUN1W1DEA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ELm21DwqXkrykMc8Qih6xA&oh=00_AfIXDHPu2JntHJSmi8YxGCgjpzDxWp0YYJcc45sPbcl9FQ&oe=68395E2E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ciDMX7NnxWYQ7kNvwHPdsgL&_nc_oc=AdlpZJPoiLWHvYLKM_EsrkCMwnnjcZFCQWLMH_zMYCuO-F53oxP_J8fdkT-yodBmx3I&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ELm21DwqXkrykMc8Qih6xA&oh=00_AfL8Hz4cEMFOiGXiLjUW8Q8NwUjLh1PuPL3E8ZMVFxmpKw&oe=68396616)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
